channel.title: Adding Dicing Command
channel.description: I would like to add a dicing command. The source is hybrid pvp v3 and gambling would be fun. Please help me for I have no idea what to do. Will rep I'm also not able to compile, the path is "@echo off "C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/Jre6/bin/java.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause" and I get an error. I put a picture of the compiler error.

item.title: Adding Dicing Command
item.dc:creator: @blddyboy blddyboy
item.description:
@blddyboy wrote:

You need to import this in clickitem.java
import server.util.Misc;

Then go to player.java and search for this.
foodDelay
Then after the ,
add this
, diceDelay

item.title: Adding Dicing Command
item.dc:creator: @blddyboy blddyboy
item.description:
@blddyboy wrote:

See if this works
Replace youre compiler code with this one.

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_30\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause

item.title: Adding Dicing Command
item.dc:creator: @blddyboy blddyboy
item.description:
@blddyboy wrote:

I have one but you have to click on the dice bag to roll.
You Have To Add It To ClickItem.java
Heres My Code For Rolling Dice.

if (itemId == 15084 && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.diceDelay >= 5000) { c.forcedChat("I have rolled a "+ Misc.random(100) +" on the percentile dice."); c.startAnimation(827); c.diceDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); }
It’s Not Mine.
I Didnt Make This Code.

Read full topic
